name: Racing Formula: Car Rivals
description:
Perfect track and extreme cars driving – leave your rivals behind!

What is the best profession in the world? Car racer is the best! You drive only the best sport cars, you can raise extreme speed, you have a lot of fans – yes, but this job is also very difficult and even dangerous! Take part into a world racing championship – are you brave enough? Racing Formula: Car Rivals invites you to the first stadium – drive fast and have fun!

Welcome to the zone of high speed and sharp turns! Control your car using pedals, avoid crashing and try to become a winner. Feel the race fever, enjoy crazy rush!

Racing Formula: Car Rivals GAME FEATURES:
- Perfectly prepared tracks;
- Different maps and locations;
- Professional sport cars;
- Amazing drive challenge – beat your opponents;
- Realistic car controls;
- Cool graphics and sounds.

Racing Formula: Car Rivals - adrenaline racing for all the race fans! Start your first race right now!
